DOC.brief_summary: Hemodialysis patient frequently complain postdialysis fatigue washed-out feeling . The aim study use blood flow rate ( BFR ) profile mitigate postdialysis washed-out state .
DOC.brief_title: Use Of Blood Flow Rate Profiling For Postdialysis Washed-Out Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Hemodialysis patient complain postdialysis washed-out state recruit . blood flow rate alter 350 ml/min first hour session decrease 50 ml/min hourly 4-hour dialysis session . blood flow rate profile continue 9 dialysis session ( 21 Days ) . Patients ask grade washed-out state scale 1 ( washed-out state ) 5 ( severe washed-out state ) blood flow rate profiling . Paired t=-test Wilcoxon Signed Ranks Test use appropriate context compare wash scale together urea reduction rate blood chemistry test .
DOC.criteria: Hemodialysis Patient Postdialysis washedout complain schedulenon complaint patient Patients recent blood pressure drug modification
